name: Deserted (Marty)
description:
If you could bring one thing on a desert island? Make your choice and then use your surroundings to survive. You must build a way to escape while also maintaining your health, hydration, warmth, and sanity. Befriend a monkey, expertly learn to purify water, and more in this 3D exploration-based puzzle game. 

Created in Unity during the 2021 Global Game Jam (https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/deserted-5)

Credits: 

  • Marty Hanapole: Programming, 2D Graphics, User Interface (UI)
  • Zach Long: Programming
  • Maria Jernigan: Music Composition, Audio Design, User Experience (UX)
  • Andrew Beall: 3D Art

CONTROLS:

  • Walk: WASD + mouse movement. 
  • Pick up items to add to inventory (those that turn yellow when you're close enough and hovered over it): Left mouse click. 
  • Scroll through to select items in inventory: Mouse wheel or J/L. 
  • Use inventory items on yourself: Right mouse click or K. 
  • Throw an inventory item away or to someone else: R.

NEED A HINT? 

  1. Pick up everything you can -- on the beach and beyond. 
  2. Your hydration level will require you to drink *drinkable* water. You can do this by boiling some fresh water... How might you combine items you find (e.g., sea glass, sticks, a bottle) to boil drinkable, non-salty water?
  3. Try playing hide-and-seek with the monkey. What makes monkeys happy? Ask yourself that each time you find him.
  4. Looking for ways to decrease boredom? Try playing a game. There are two of them within the environment. 
  5. That big angry red snake is much less angry at night.
